question: What is the theme of the 2017 World Radio Day (WRD)?
option2: Radio in Times of Emergency and Disaster
option4: Gender Equality and Women’s Empowerment in Radio
explanation: The World Radio Day (WRD) is observed every year on February 13 to celebrate radio as the medium for entertainment, information and the mode for communication. The 2017 theme is “Radio is You!” a call for greater participation of audiences and communities in the policy and planning of radio broadcasting. The day provides an opportunity to honour how radio is uniquely positioned to bring communities together and promote positive dialogue for change.
